metadata.title: Extended WPF Toolkit
metadata.description: The Extended WPF Toolkit is a collection of WPF controls, components and utilities made available outside the normal WPF Toolkit. Now with 30 controls, all provided under the Microsoft Public License for maximum freedom. Notable updates and new controls in the latest release (v1.6): CheckComboBox, PropertyGrid, TimelinePanel. Documentation, source, and discussions are available at http://wpftoolkit.codeplex.com.
metadata.summary: The Extended WPF Toolkit is a collection of WPF controls and components made available outside the normal WPF Toolkit. Now with 30 controls.
metadata.releaseNotes: Added 2 new controls: CheckComboBox and TimelinePanel. CheckListBox has breaking changes. PropertyGrid has new features.
